description: Sum of prime power divisors of n (1 included).
comments: Sum of n-th row of triangle A210208. [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 18 2012]
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = A000203(n) - A035321(n) = A023889(n) + 1.a(1) = 1, a(p) = p+1, a(pq) = p+q+1, a(pq...z) = (p+q+...+z) + 1, a(p^k) = (p^(k+1)-1) / (p-1), for p, q = primes, k = natural numbers, pq...z = product of k (k > 2) distinct primes p, q, ..., z.
example: For n = 12, set of such divisors is {1, 2, 3, 4}; a(12) = 1+2+3+4 = 10. From
prog: (PARI) for(n=1,100, s=1; fordiv(n,d, if((ispower(d,,&z)&&isprime(z)) || isprime(d),s+=d)); print1(s,", "))(Haskell)a023888 = sum . a210208_row  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 18 2012
